classroom.name: classroom
classroom.description: You're in a lecture hall, for some reason.

exits.description: A door leads into the hall.

hallway.name: hallway
hallway.description: This is a hallway with many locked doors.

exits.description: You see a slightly opened mahogany door letting chatter echo into the hallway, of course you want to open it!
A door with the words STAIRS is stuck open.
Nevermind; go back to the hallway.
A door at the bottom of the stairs has a red, glowing, EXIT sign.

new classroom.name: new classroom
new classroom.description: You step in and see Laurie Patton teaching a lecture! What a great president! Also, everyone is looking at you.

exits.description: You run out of the room, tears streaming down your face. How could you embarass yourself that badly?

Well so what if people stare, you came here to learn and thus take a seat in an open desk. Noone is sitting there due to covid restriction. However, you already counted how many beds there were and, with the n+2 rule, you seemed safe to sit down.

desk.name: desk
desk.description: The moment you sit down, you fall into a zen-like trance. Laurie Patton serenades you with the history of religious history. After 75 minutes, you gain an honorary degree and graduate mega clam chowder
